channel.title: Whats the most funny thing youv'e ever laughed at?
channel.description: Ok so I saw an extremely fat girl fall down the street earlier today and barrel rolled, then scrapes her face and came to a stop. then her dad (or uncle or w.e) came running, helped her up, and gave her a candy bar (I think it was a snickers bar). She was crying but as soon as he gave her the candy car she stopped, started laughing and ran down the street. It was so funny I actually cried and my stomach hurt. I guess it was funny because it was so random and the dad fed her a candy bar as a person would feed a dog a treat after doing something good. It was so random and yet hilarious (imo). Has anything really weird happened to you or made you laugh extremely hard? Please be detailed im bored and could use a good laugh.

@Vexillum wrote:

When I first ate a kids cuisine and saw the pizza. I was like haha this wasn’t worth 4$

item.title: Whats the most funny thing youv'e ever laughed at?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:27, topic:402843”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=499904.msg3656421#msg3656421 date=1310058370]
When I went to pass a guy (i was on a 750 crotchrocket) and ge floored his truck (97ish s10). I hit 115 before I let off. He wasn’t visible behind me nemore lol.
[/quote]750cc crotch rocket? Jesus.[/quote]
Lol I ordered pistons.for the 1000cc model and have an appointment next saturday to get the engile bored n stroked to around (estimated) 900cc.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats the most funny thing youv'e ever laughed at?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:6, topic:402843”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=499904.msg3656203#msg3656203 date=1310034301]
First time I ever got stoned, was watching cartoon channel with my mate and begun laughing so hard that I threw up
[/quote]

First time i got drunk was less or more the same ;
we were with like 8 people all fucked up sitting on the couch in front of the TV , watching nickelodeon when avatar was on…
my friend vomitted out of the window , onto my friend’s bike ( who was giving the party )[/quote]Long live Avatar. Airbending FTW.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the most funny thing youv'e ever laughed at?

item.title: Whats the most funny thing youv'e ever laughed at?
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

When my friend was absent from school we took all of his papers he had to hand in and wrote random crap next to his name on top:

Example ( his name is Jacob ):

Jacob takes it up the butthole every night.

It was sorta childish but I’ve never laughed so hard.

Read full topic
